newsitems.title: UGC League Winter 2017 Season is Starting!
newsitems.contents: Prepare yourself, the UGC League Winter Season is about to start! Join the thousands of teams that played last season for some competitive TF2 action! The first week of matches starts January 23rd for Highlander, January 25th for 6v6 and January 27th for 4v4. UGC has divisions across North America...

newsitems.title: Good will to all teams in TF2 s new autobalancing
newsitems.author: contact@rockpapershotgun.com (Alice O'Connor)

newsitems.title: Team Fortress 2's Smissmas event brings new taunts, Casual match improvements
newsitems.contents: Smissmas, the magical time of year when men with big guns, questionable morality, and an unusual commitment to a two-tone color scheme are given all-new, all-festive ways to inflict violence upon one another, has once again come to Team Fortress 2!. This year's magical event features a slew of ...
